channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: On the Homological Stability of Orthogonal and Spin Groups
item.description: arXiv:2206.00981v4 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We improve homological stability ranges for the orthogonal group, special orthogonal group, elementary orthogonal group and the spin group over a commutative local ring $R$ with infinite residue field such that $2 \in R^{*}$.
item.dc:creator: Marco Schlichting, Sunny Sood

item.title: A universal coefficient theorem for actions of finite groups on C*-algebras
item.description: arXiv:2406.11787v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: The equivariant bootstrap class in the Kasparov category of actions of a finite group G consists of those actions that are equivalent to one on a Type I C*-algebra. Using a result by Arano and Kubota, we show that this bootstrap class is already generated by the continuous functions on G/H for all cyclic subgroups H of G. Then we prove a Universal Coefficient Theorem for the localisation of this bootstrap class at the group order |G|. This allows us to classify certain G-actions on stable Kirchberg algebras up to cocycle conjugacy.
item.dc:creator: Ralf Meyer, George Nadareishvili
